content: its always great to have something warm comfy and snugly during the cool fall and winter time of the year many crocheters love making crocheted scarves cowls cardigans gloves hats and beanies are these cooler months these also make lovely gifts and are great for donations i love making crochet beanie hats and caps they are super versatile you can easily make them in any size you need today am sharing the pattern for simple willow crochet beanie hat i made this as a winter crochet set blog hop 2025 hosted by sandra from sandra stitches its a fun to make pattern with easy stitches crocheted hats are often great beginner crochet project this easy beanie cap pattern is perfect for beginner crocheters too materials used - 8 ply cotton yarn 1 skein 4 50 mm crochet hook size - 6 inches height 7 inches brim - can be customized to any size checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/5gwkgj2aac8 here is the pattern link to the matching set of easy willow crochet fingerless gloves https //rajiscrafthobby blogspot com/2025/01/easy-willow-crochet-fingerless-gloves html
